rules.name: Winning
rules.desc: Be alive at the end of the round

rules.name: Guns are overrated
rules.desc: As an innocent, kill a traitor with the crowbar

rules.name: Win the round with a jihad bomb
rules.desc: Must be within 3 seconds of the end of the game

rules.name: One deag
rules.desc: score the round-winning kill with a 360 noscope using a single-fire weapon (Deagle, shotgun, rifle, awp)

rules.name: Trickster
rules.desc: As a traitor, convince an innocent to kill another innocent

rules.name: 360 noscope
rules.desc: points awarded for every kill scored with a 360 no-scope using a scoped weapon (sniper)

rules.name: ambidextrous
rules.desc: play a full round with the mouse in the wrong hand
